website_summaries.verdict: Because you can never have too much pink. These adjustable earmuffs will always  coordinate with other girly outerwear.
pros: Stay in place even on curly hair
Plush pile and printed knit construction Multi-color jacquard knitted print on outer ear cover
cons: The tag is sewn right on the inside of the ear fixture, so you'll want to remove it before wearing

customer_reviews.title: They work well and I like the adjustable feature so that as she grows they ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter as she wanted ear muffs for Christmas. They work well and I like the adjustable feature so that as she grows they will still fit. The only thing I didn't like was that there is a tag sewn right on the inside of one of the muffs, so it was uncomfortable on her ear. I had to use a stitch picker/seam ripper and remove the tag. It looks fine now and was lightly stitched, but it was kind of a pain to have to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted colorful earmuffs and these fit the bill. The adjustment on them is nice. Quality seems good. Only complaint like others have said is the tag for them is sewn in on the cushioned part of the ear muff that touches your ear. Doesn't make much sense to put it there. But you can carefully cut away the tag and remove it.
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love these things. Super cute and seem to be made well. They are adjustable so my 7 year old and tiny headed 4 year old can both use them. My only beef with these is the placement of the tags. They are right inside the ear part and my daughter finds them irritating. Other than that, they are good.
customer_reviews.author: AlliSw22

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn them a few times so far, but they seem to do what they're meant to and keep my ears warm. However, they feel very cheap and I don't expect them to last long. I've had them for about a week and the fuzz is already starting to fall off, and the headband piece is lopsided. It's made of plastic under the knit design, but I'm worried about breaking it if I try to straighten them out because the plastic is so cheap feeling. All in all, for the $10 I paid for them, they're not bad, but certainly not something I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Truly small and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: So many earmuffs aren't adjustable. With these, you're able to push the sides down, into the earmuff itself to shorten the headband. They don't shorten a lot - but enough for small heads. And the muff is soft against little ears. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Super fun design and print
customer_reviews.text: Super fun design and print. Bought a matching pair for me and my toddler for those extremely cold Alaskan temps. Made it fun for her to wear and not protest. Kept us warm.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE L HAAS

customer_reviews.title: Hope they last
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. They are for a five year old, so I don’t know how long the headband part will last as she may be a little rough with them and it feels like flimsy plastic.

product_meta.title: N'Ice Caps Girls Soft Plush Padded Knitted Design Adjustable Winter Earmuffs
product_meta.description: N'Ice Caps Girls Soft Plush Padded Knitted Design Adjustable Winter Earmuffs will be sure to keep your child warm this winter! The adjustable band allows earmuff to fit a wide age range from 4-18 years. Available in knitted hearts design and knitted rainbow design and several other designs.
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE, FITS 4-18 YEARS: The earmuffs have an adjustable band that adjusts 1 inch up and down on each side and can fit a wide age range for girls. The earmuffs are recommended for ages 4-18 years. The earmuffs have a soft plush padded ear warmer that is comfortable and easy to wear. The adjustable band and plush padding allow for a tight, secure fit to keep the earmuffs in place.

WARM AND COMFORTABLE: The plush padding on the earmuffs is very warm and provides great insulation, and will keep your child’s ears warm in cold weather. The plush padding is bulky and large, approximately 3.5 inches long and 1 inch across, and easily covers the ears. The padding is also made of a soft fabric that is very comfortable to wear. These are great for active girls who love running around outside!

LIGHTWEIGHT AND EASY TO WEAR: These adjustable earmuffs are very lightweight and easy to wear and weigh approximately 2.5 ounces. Because of the lightweight construction, the earmuffs are easy to travel with and convenient to carry around places and well suited for taking to school. These earmuffs are great for winter outdoors activities including skiing, snowboarding, ice skating, and playing in the snow.

BEAUTIFUL HEARTS, JACQUARD PRINTS AND DESIGNS TO CHOOSE FROM: Your girls will enjoy wearing these fun designs. Choose from a wide selection of beautiful hearts, jacquard prints and other designs. The earmuffs are also available in several different color combinations to match all of your child’s winter cold weather gear, and are also available on solid colors.

WE ARE FROM MINNESOTA. IT’S COLD UP HERE! With over 30 years of experience shoveling snow in Minnesota winters, we at N’Ice Caps understand the importance of having quality and safe winter apparel. We are deeply committed to providing you with high quality products so that your little ones will stay warm and safe while having fun playing outside in the winter.
